description:
When starting a new chat session, display conversation starters based on available knowledge bases and recent solve/research outputs. Show example queries like 'Summarize findings from [recent research]' or 'Quiz me on [KB topic]' with one-click insertion.

**Rationale:** Empty chat sessions miss the opportunity to bridge users into multi-turn conversations leveraging their existing context. Smart suggestions reduce cognitive load, demonstrate chat capabilities with RAG/web augmentation, and increase feature discoverability.
title: Smart Suggestions in Empty Chat Sessions
